DOC.brief_title: Effects Low-Dose Doxycycline Oral Bone Loss
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose clinical trial determine whether low-dose doxycycline ( LDD ) reduce alveolar bone density loss postmenopausal osteopenic woman periodontitis hormone replacement therapy ( i.e. , estrogen deficient ) . The effect LDD alveolar bone height loss , progressive periodontal attachment loss , systemic bone mineral density , gingival crevicular fluid biochemical marker collagen degradation bone resorption serum biomarkers bone formation , bone resorption inflammation also assess . In addition , another objective determine microbial effect obtain LDD two year equivalent placebo control . This clinical trial involve two clinical site : University Nebraska Medical Center College Dentistry Stony Brook University School Dental Medicine . A total 128 postmenopausal osteopenic woman periodontitis age 45 70 time telephone screen randomize LDD placebo group subject follow two year .
